summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ClickMenuJA marketing page. All core functionality verified including floating navbar, branding, features, pricing, FAQ accordion, navigation, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Content Security Policy blocking Cloudinary images - img-src policy needs update

passed_tests: Floating glass navbar visible and positioned at top
Brand name 'ClickMenuJA' appears correctly in navbar and footer
Hero section has white background with red accents
Features section contains exactly 6 feature cards
Pricing section shows 3 plans: Starter ($19), Growth ($36), Pro ($79)
Merchant Login button navigates to login view
Become a Merchant button navigates to signup view
Navbar stays visible when scrolling down
Mobile hamburger button appears at smaller viewport widths
All static assets (CSS, JS) load successfully
action_item_for_main_agent: Update Content Security Policy to allow Cloudinary images by adding 'https://res.cloudinary.com' to img-src directive in server.js helmet configuration
